core.name: SHOWTIME!
core.description:
Leader Bonus:
SHOWTIME!: Entire team gains 40.0% Melee Physical DMG.

subskills.name: SHOWTIME!
subskills.description: Entire team gains 40.0% Melee Physical DMG.

core.name: Charged ATK: TYPHOON! YAY!
core.description:
Spin ATK that hurts nearby enemies.
TYPHOON CHOP: Tap and hold [ATK] to spin, dealing 110% ATK of Physical DMG. Release the [ATK] button to stop the spinning.
TYPHOON CHOP builds up spice and must stop when it's too spicy, but Spice dissipates faster that way. Attacks on Roza gain +7% Total DMG Multiplier per second in TYPHOON CHOP. Max stacks: 7.
Blueberry Blitz in the team: TYPHOON CHOP pulls in enemies. Release and tap [ATK] to unleash VODKA FINALE, dealing 1100% ATK of Physical DMG but adding 33% Spice.

subskills.name: KLANG KLANG!
subskills.description: During THPHOON CHOP, attacks from 5 meters away suffer 60% Total DMG Reduction. Also provides Ignore Interrupt to said attacks.

subskills.name: I KAN'T STOP!
subskills.description: TYPHOON CHOP deals 12.0% more Physical DMG per second. Max stacks: 7. Each stack dissipates every 0.1s after TYPHOON CHOP ends. When TYPHOON CHOP or Basic ATK hits, character recovers 0.75 SP. CD: 1s.

core.name: Passive
core.description:
Passive bonuses apply automatically
Some attacks become Joint ATKs when Blueberry Blitz is also on the team. During Joint ATKs, Blueberry Blitz is considered to be summoned and the damage comes from Molotov Cherry.
With Blueberry Blitz alive, Basic ATK Sequence 3/4 reduces Spice by 5%/10% respectively, while Joint ATK Sequence 3/4/5 reduces Spice by 5%/5%/10% respectively.

subskills.name: HIT THAT THING!
subskills.description: When Combo Hit Count exceeds 10/30, character gains a 20.0%/50.0% Total DMG Multiplier buff. Character gains a 40.0% Total DMG Multiplier buff against enemies affected by Weaken or Time Slow.

subskills.name: I GOT HEALING!
subskills.description: Heal 15.0 HP/s when enemies are nearby.

subskills.name: LILI! HELP!
subskills.description: If Blueberry Blitz is in the team, then auto-switch to Blueberry Blitz before death and heal self for 2000 HP. Triggers 1 time per battle only.

core.name: VODKA CHOPPA
core.description:
A powerful chop that demolishes nearby enemies.
CHOPPA: 2000% ATK of Physical DMG
CHOPPA WITH LILI (Joint ATK): 500% + 3000% ATK of Physical DMG. Blueberry Blitz also gains 35 SP.
SP Cost: 100. Base CD: 20s.

subskills.name: MOAR CHOPPY!
subskills.description: After performing the Ultimate, the character's next TYPHOON CHOP gains 25.0% Total DMG Multiplier. If Blueberry Blitz is switched in after that, she gains 25.0% Total DMG Multiplier for 12s.

subskills.name: VODKA GURLZ!
subskills.description: After performing the Ultimate, character and Blueberry Blitz gain 30% Total DMG Reduction for 9.0s.

core.name: CAN'T TOUCH ME!
core.description:
Evades enemy attack.
VODKA SHIELD: Ultimate Evasion triggers a 3s Time Fracture and generates a shield that absorbs DMG equal to 15% of the Valkyrie's Max HP.
The shield lasts 6s; CD: 15s.

subskills.name: YOU'RE TRAPPED!
subskills.description: Activating Ultimate Evasion skill immobilizes nearby enemies for 4.0s.

subskills.name: I GOT SHIELDZ!
subskills.description: When the Ultimate Evasion barrier on, Crit Rate increases by 25.0%.

core.name: CHOP CHOP!
core.description:
4-Sequence greatsword swing!
1st Sequence: 110% ATK of Physical DMG
2nd Sequence: 60% + 70% ATK of Physical DMG
3rd Sequence: 50% + 150% ATK of Physical DMG
4th Sequence: 2x40% + 200% ATK of Physical DMG 
Joint ATK Sequence 2: 130% + 90% ATK of Physical DMG
Joint ATK Sequence 3: 100% + 100% ATK of Physical DMG
Joint ATK Sequence 4: 140% + 100% ATK of Physical DMG
Joint ATK Sequence 5: 2x60% + 150% ATK of Physical DMG

subskills.name: BOOM BOOM!
subskills.description: If Blueberry Blitz is in the team, character's Basic ATK gains 25% Total DMG Multiplier to BIO-type enemies. Switching in Blueberry Blitz gives her Tactical Buff, where her Basic/Charged ATKs gain 25% Total DMG Multiplier for 7s.

subskills.name: QTE: KATYUSHA HAMMA!
subskills.description: QTE: Triggered when enemy is weakened or its shield breaks to deal 800% ATK of Physical DMG to enemies nearby, gather them stun them for 5s, and inflict 6 Stun Trauma. When Valkyrie enters upon QTE with Blueberry Blitz switched out, the gather effect is greatly enhanced. Also Valkyrie has higher Ignore Interrupt and deal 20% bonus Total DMG for 15s (disabled in co-op & squad mode).

subskills.name: LILI! WAIT!
subskills.description: Sequences 3, 4, and 5 of Basic Joint ATKs each restores 2.50 SP for Blueberry Blitz.
